description: TEHRAN - Lebanon’s Hezbollah struck a severe blow to Israel after firing hundreds of rockets towards the regime’s military sites on Sunday morning.
title: Arbaeen Operation

description: When Russia’s invasion of Ukraine appeared imminent in early 2022, U.S. intelligence officials were so confident that Russian tanks would roll quickly to victory that staff evacuated the U.S. embassy in Kyiv.
title: The crumbling foundations of American strength

description: TEHRAN - Israeli Foreign Minister Israel Katz said on Friday that Israel won’t permit the establishment of a Palestinian state, claiming that such a state would pose a security threat to Israel.
title: Israel Katz must stop inventing pretexts

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s intelligence minister, Esmaeil Khatib, announced on Saturday that there was no involvement from foreign intelligence operatives in the assassination of Ismail Haniyeh, the Hamas political leader, in Tehran.
title: Iran intelligence minister dismisses foreign operatives’ involvement in Haniyeh assassination

description: TEHRAN- Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian has committed to advancing social justice through his administration’s focus on “national unity.”
title: Pezeshkian pledges to pursue social justice for all Iranians

description: TEHRAN- The chief commander of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) has reaffirmed Tehran's commitment to taking action against the Zionist regime in response to its offenses on Iranian territory.
title: IRGC chief reiterates commitment to avenging Haniyeh's assassination

description: TEHRAN- Senior officials from Iran and Spain have highlighted the importance of enhancing legal and judicial collaboration between their nations.
title: Iran, Spain highlight importance of expanding legal and judicial collaboration

description: TEHRAN- A meeting focused on the friendship and cooperation between Iran and Turkey took place in Istanbul, featuring a message from Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian, who praised the enduring relationship between the two nations.
title: Iran, Turkey officials hold friendship meeting in Istanbul

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s foreign ministry has extended congratulations to Ukraine on its Independence Day.
title: Iran congratulates Ukraine on Independence Day

description: TEHRAN- The Iranian ambassador to Vietnam, Ali Akbar Nazari, and Vietnamese Minister of Public Security Luang Tem Quang have emphasized the need to enhance collaboration in crime prevention efforts.
title: Iran, Vietnam pledge to strengthen cooperation in combatting crime

description: TEHRAN - The Israeli military has announced the death of more soldiers during confrontations with the Palestinian resistance forces in the Gaza Strip.
title: 5 more Israeli troops killed in Gaza

description: TEHRAN – Iran's new Foreign Minister, Abbas Araqchi, who served as the lead negotiator during the talks that resulted in the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA), has indicated that reviving the deal will be more complex than it once seemed.
title: Reviving the JCPOA not as easy as it may have been: Iran FM

description: TEHRAN– Iran's foreign minister has declared Tehran's intention to respond decisively to the assassination of Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh, who was killed in Tehran on July 31.
title: Iran emphasizes ‘legitimate right’ to retaliate against Israel

description: TEHRAN– On Sunday, August 25, 2024, a solemn Arbaeen mourning ceremony, organized by students, took place at the Imam Khomeini (ra) Hussainiyah. The ceremony was graced by the presence of Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.
title: Imam Hussain’s battle with oppression never-ending: Leader

description: TEHRAN- The commander-in-chief of Iranian Army, accompanied by a team of commanders, deputies, and Army officials, convened with the Iranian Minister of Defense and Armed Forces Logistics.
title: Iranian Army chief holds meeting with Minister of Defense

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s foreign ministry spokesman has expressed strong confidence that the Palestinian people will ultimately prevail in their ongoing struggle against the Israeli regime.
title: Iran says Palestinian victory inevitable in struggle against Israel

description: Hundreds of people gathered in front of the Israeli embassy in Stockholm on Sunday to show their support for Palestinians who have been subjected to a massive Israeli military assault on Gaza, where the death toll has surpassed the grim figure of 40,400 since October of last year.
title: Pro-Palestine protesters march to Israeli embassy in Stockholm

description: The French authorities on Saturday detained Pavel Durov, the top executive of the online communications platform Telegram, on charges related to the spread of illicit material on the service, according to French news media reports.
title: Telegram founder arrested in France

description: At least 35 Palestinians have been detained in the past two days across the occupied West Bank, the latest joint statement by the Palestinian Prisoner’s Society and the Commission of Detainees and Ex-Detainees Affairs said on Sunday.
title: Israeli forces arrest 35 Palestinians in West Bank

description: The Israeli military has left a massive trail of destruction in the wake of its pounding of the Hamad City development in southern Gaza’s Khan Younis that has killed or displaced many Palestinians.
title: Close to 70 percent of buildings in Gaza’s Hamad City destroyed

description: TEHRAN- “Pirouz and Parizad” opera by Iranian composer and tar virtuoso Ali Ghamsari will be back to Tehran’s Vahdat Hall in September after its successful performance in May and June, which was welcomed by the audience.
title: Ali Ghamsari’s “Pirouz and Parizad” opera to return to Vahdat Hall

description: TEHRAN-Veteran Iranian stage and cinema director Ali Rafiei is set to hold a series of educational theater workshops across Iran.
title: Veteran theater director Ali Rafiei to hold nationwide workshops

description: TEHRAN- Two Iranian works will take part in the 25th Calgary International Film Festival (CIFF), due to be held from September 19 to 29 in Alberta, Canada.
title: Calgary International Film Festival to screen 2 Iranian movies

description: TEHRAN- Iranian artist Hassan Ruholamin has created a new artwork beside the holy shrines of Imam Hussein (AS) and his brother Hazrat Abbas (AS) in Karbala, to commemorate Arbaeen.
title: Ruholamin unveils new painting at Karbala to mark Arbaeen

description: TEHRAN - Iran's Bam Khatoon FC came from behind to defeat Royal Thimphu College FC of Bhutan 2-1 in their opening AFC Women’s Champions League 2024/25 Preliminary Stage Group D tie on Sunday.
title: Bam defeat Royal Thimphu College at AFC Women's Champions League

description: TEHRAN - In the first seven months of the current year, Iran emerged as the fifth-largest source of tourists for Türkiye, contributing significantly to the country’s booming tourism sector.
title: Iran ranks Türkiye’s fifth source of tourism

description: TEHRAN - Qazvin, a city with a rich cultural heritage, has long been celebrated as Iran’s capital of calligraphy.
title: Qazvin: Iran’s capital of calligraphy

description: TEHRAN – A dedicated export terminal for handicrafts is set to be established within the Mazandaran free zone, a move aimed at boosting the province’s international trade presence in this sector, according to a local official.
title: Export terminal to beat the drum for Mazandaran’s handicraft

description: TEHRAN - A special pottery workshop for children and young adults was recently organized in the village of Korit, which is situated in Tabas county of South Khorasan province.
title: Special pottery workshop for children held

description: TEHRAN - A 2,200-year-old bronze coffin, believed to belong to a royal figure from the Seleucid era, is set to be displayed in Lorestan after 20 years, offering a unique glimpse into ancient Iranian history.
title: 2,200-year-old Seleucid-era coffin to go on display in Lorestan

description: TEHRAN - Sri Lanka has announced a new initiative to boost its tourism sector by offering free 30-day tourist visas to visitors from over 30 countries, including Iran.
title: Sri Lanka offers free 30-day visas to tourists from Iran and over 30 other countries

description: TEHRAN - Iran-Tajikistan tourism roadshow has been held at the Tajik embassy in Tehran, just days after the implementation of a visa waiver for air travel between the two nations.
title: Iran-Tajikistan tourism roadshow held following visa waiver agreement

description: TEHRAN - The 24th season of the Iran Persian Gulf Pro League (PGPL) has kicked off amid a new controversy: the inconsistent and often questionable use of the Video Assistant Referee (VAR) system. Despite the introduction of VAR in five out of the first 16 matches, officiating controversies have persisted, casting a shadow over the league.
title: VAR implementation in PGPL faces significant challenges
